item.title: UniPose: A Unified Multimodal Framework for Human Pose Comprehension, Generation and Editing
item.description: UniPose: A unified multimodal framework for human pose comprehension, generation, and editing, enabling seamless transitions across various modalities and showcasing zero-shot generalization.

item.title: Continuous Speculative Decoding for Autoregressive Image Generation
item.description: Researchers have developed Continuous Speculative Decoding, boosting autoregressive image generation speed by up to 2.33x while maintaining image quality.
